name: Link in Chat
description:
Created for the O2A2 Visual Novel Game Jam.

ButterToast 378 is streaming on Mitch.tv! You are his only viewer. Talk to him in chat! Be nice! (Or be mean, if you really want to...)

Content warnings: There is one brief swearword.

My first finished game in Ren'Py. Takes about two minutes to play. No sounds because I didn't know what to add. <:,) All  the bounce "animations" and shaking and chat-based text were done with code in engine. Finished it in about a day.
